# UriExtensions.GetQueryValue method

Parses the Query using String).

```csharp
public static string? GetQueryValue(this Uri uri, string name)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| uri | A Uri. |
| name | A query parameter name. |

## Return Value

A value, if found.

## Remarks

Use [`GetQueryValues`](./GetQueryValues.md) if the query parameter has multiple values.
